question: You recently attended a meeting at a hotel. When you returned home, you found you had left some important papers at the hotel. Write a letter to the manager of the hotel. In your letter.•	Say where you think you left the papers•	Explain why they are so important•	Tell the manager what you want him /her to do
text: I am Ganesh from XYZ and I am writing this to bring your attention to a lost and found item.

Last Monday, I came to your hotel to participate in a conference which was held in the Greenway ballroom. I bought some documents with me which were relevant to the event, but somehow I have misplaced them. I am sure, there are on the ballroom main table  because I kept my bag on it.
These documents were very crucial, and I was preparing these to present them at a meeting that we have in next week. Which means, the 5th of July.
If you have already found those, could you please keep them with the receptionist? Because I know her since my childhood. I can easily collect those from her.
I would appreciate your immediate attention to this matter. I look forward to hearing from you.
